product_name: The North Face Regulate Jacket - Women's
long_description: Streamline your cross-country ski layers in the sleek Regulate soft-shell women's jacket from The North Face. It has a wind-resistant exterior with an interior mesh lining for next-to-skin comfort. Woven stretch body has knit panels at the neck, down the center back and at the sides for improved mobility and breathability. When your hands need light protection in chilly weather, pull the mitts out from the internal cuffs and cover your fingers. The women's Regulate soft-shell women's jacket from The North Face features reflective piping to keep you visible in dim light. Secure hand pockets; media-player compatible; articulated elbows.
short_description: Streamline your cross-country ski layers in the sleek Regulate soft-shell women's jacket from The North Face. It has a wind-resistant exterior with an interior mesh lining for next-to-skin comfort.
